content: HS-SC Setting tool Setting tool for driving compatible expansion anchors (e.g. HSV/HSA/HST/KB3/KB-TZ2) into concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Setting tools and accessories ### FEATURES:Features Ideal for overhead applications Drive expansion anchors quickly and easily Eliminate the need for a hammer where access is limited or work space is congested Accepted by all hammer drills with a TE-C (SDS) connection Applications Driving expansion anchors into concrete with a rotary hammer drill ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 337918 - Mechanical setting tool KB 6 TE-C - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HS-SC 150 Setting tool - 337919 - Mechanical setting tool KB 12 TE-C - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HS-SC 300 Setting tool
